comment:
Nose - malt and caramel with some distinctive spicy notes
Taste - toasted baking spices and caramel, with a bit of chocolate and nuttiness
Finish - lingering spice and some dryness, minimal burn
Classic bourbon nose. Tastes of grain and a little sour. Fine for drinking or old fashioneds
Fruity upfront. Berry jam. Oily and viscous. Oaky finish.
